price: Yεn (Soro abͻfoͻ no) yensiane (mma asaase so) gyesε (εnam) wo Wura Nyankopͻn ahyεdeε so. Ɔno na deε εwͻ y’anim ne deε εwͻ y’akyi ne deε εwͻ ne mmienu mfinimfii (nyinaa) wͻ no. Wo Wura Nyankopͻn werε mmfi (hwee).
arabic: وَمَا نَتَنَزَّلُ إِلَّا بِأَمۡرِ رَبِّكَۖ لَهُۥ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِينَا وَمَا خَلۡفَنَا وَمَا بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَۚ وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ نَسِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā natanazzalu illā bi-amri rabbika lahu mā bayna aydīnā wamā khalfanā wamā bayna dhālika wamā kāna rabbuka nasiyyan
